result.reason: The 'Expand All' function currently relies on the underlying control's behavior, which only expands visible (filtered) nodes. Users expect all nodes to be expanded when the filter is cleared.
result.approach: Modify the UserExpandAll method to explicitly update the internal pre-filter expansion state (_preFilterExpandedObjects) to include all containers when a filter is active. This ensures that when the filter is removed, the restoration logic expands all folders.

attempts.raw_output:
```json
{
"decision": "implement",
"reason": "The 'Expand All' function currently relies on the underlying control's behavior, which only expands visible (filtered) nodes. Users expect all nodes to be expanded when the filter is cleared.",
"priority": "P3-enhancement",
"estimated_files": ["mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/ConnectionTree/ConnectionTree.cs"],
"approach": "Modify the UserExpandAll method to explicitly update the internal pre-filter expansion state (_preFilterExpandedObjects) to include all containers when a filter is active. This ensures that when the filter is removed, the restoration logic expands all folders."
}
```
